transcript:
Executive: [Ringing] The fan not answering is still we are trying.
Hellow?
Executive: Haanji.
Executive: Sir, very good morning. Mai Alok baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se registration manager. Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Kal actually baat hui thi na hum log connect kar rahe the to us time actually I think busy the aap to baat nahi ho payi thi. Sir aapne feedback diya tha IndiaMART pe to usi ke regarding mujhe thoda discussion karna tha ki kaisa hai feedback abhi overall IndiaMART ki services ki agar jo mai baat karu to.
Customer: Kya kara?
Executive: Mai keh raha hu IndiaMART ka abhi overall feedback kaisa hai sir abhi services ki agar jo mai baat karu to. Mai diya to aapko maza nahi tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wo aapne fake likha hua hai sir ek statement aapne fake likh diya usko mai samajh nahi pa raha na ki bhai kya cheez fake hai sir.
Customer: Inquiry jab tak jab aapko lena hota hai subscription tabhi aati hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Baad me sari inquiry wo jati hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To aapke hisab se aap kya kehna chah rahe ki bhai inquiry jo generate ho rahi hai wo fake hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Jo jaise pehle mera chota plan tha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Tab hamara wo chota plan bhi use nahi ho pata tha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Usme kuch 10-12 wo number milte the wo 10-12 bhi nahi use kar pa raha tha. Aa gaya ki ab jab bada plan lenge to aise aapko milta hai ye hota hai wo hota hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To humne bada plan liya aur 10 number nahi use kar pa rahe hai kyuki usse related koi inquiry aa hi nahi rahi hai ki mai usme ye karu.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ye keh rahe hai ki jo aapki major category hai.
Customer: Jis to mere ko jo hum log karte hi hai wo sab inquiry aati hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye jo category aapki lagi hai Kirloskar diesel generator laga hai DG generator laga hua hai aapka DG set.
Customer: Ye pehle hi humne. Ji hai na. Ki jaise aap yaha se subscription liye hue hai aur ye sab paanch saat saal se hamara mamla matlab hum karte hai ye sab. Abhi hum jab kuch dalenge to aap humko setting batayenge ye setting kariye wo setting kariye fir uske baad se jab wo setting ho jayega tabhi bhi kuch nahi hota fir dedh mahine baad do mahine baad mai aise hi likhunga aur fir aapka aayega ye beech me. Sir aap ye setting kar lijiye wo setting setting karne ke liye to pehle batate ki setting hota hai tabhi aata hai inquiry setting nikalana nahi ho payega bhai.
Executive: Hmm. To diesel generator ki to abhi bhi show ho rahi hai sir abhi aap agar check karoge 10 ghante pehle Azamgarh Uttar Pradesh ki lead bachi hui hai 10 ghante pehle.
Customer: Haan dekhiye 7:30 ke liye ki show ho rahi hai 7:30 ke liye generator nahi bikta hamare yaha 10 ke liye bikta hai dekhiye uske niche aapka ye Gorakhpur aaya 40 aur 62 samajh me aaya uske pehle Maharaj to abhi hai na aise abhi ab aayenge ek baar aa jayega fir nahi aayega. Aise dekhiye Maharajganj aaya open generator hai koi humko matlab nahi hai Azamgarh 7:30 ke liye koi matlab nahi hai. Saunagar Bihar koi hamara yaha se matlab hi nahi hai Bihar se fir wo baga Bihar hamara koi matlab hi nahi hai Naugadh Uttar Pradesh ye open generator ki inquiry hai kabhi bhi chalo consume kar lo kyuki ye open dekhe hi hai log to open lenge hi log.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Uske baad se aap dekhiye Kushinagar 25 KVA.
Executive: Ji. Thik?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye 32 KVA ek dikha raha hai. Ye abhi.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Uske baad Maharajganj 10 KVA aise dekhenge na to abhi jaise maine dala aap de denge char paanch fir uske baad se wahi haal rahega aap ye chodhiye itna lamba kyu kariye aap kya kariye na jaiye usme kya kehte hai hum humne kitne by leads consume kiye hai ye data hoga na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Usme aap jaiye aur ye dekhiye ki humne pichle kitne by leads ko waise hi chod diya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir mai aapko batana chah raha hu mai mai isliye batana chah raha hu IndiaMART jo lead generate karta hai mai aapko tarika bata deta hu hum log jo hai na product ke name aur jis category ke sath uski mapping ho rakhi hai uske according lead generate karte hai. It doesn't matter ki wo waha pe kitne KVA ka hai sir. Specification ka jo hai na wo hum logo ne koi check nahi laga rakha ki bhai is time.
Customer: To aap logo ne sir gaya ki aap jab wo delete kiya kariye usme dala kariye ki humko paanch ke liye 7:30 ke liye nahi chahiye humne aisa kam se kam 200 300 delete kiya fir bhi wo aane laga humne kaha koi matlab nahi hai bas aap log naya naya story batate hai. Bataye filhal aapko kya bataiye.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye mai baat karu November me abhi tak jo hai char dino ke andar aapne 10 by lead use kar chuke hai.
Executive: October mahine me total aapne 113 by lead use ki thi aur usme jitni bhi lead use hui hai ha mai bata to raha hu sir 113 lead me koi bhi lead aisi nahi dikh rahi ki jo 10 KVA se niche aapne use ki ho. Kal bhi aapne jo aaj bhi jo aapne use ki abhi ye subah se morning me ek do teen char paanch paanch lead to abhi bhi aap use karte hue 40 KVA ki 20 KVA ki 25 KVA ki 32 KVA ki 500 KVA ki sir.
Customer: Abhi maine kar diya na abhi to de doge bhaiya uske baad se fir nahi doge.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai aap intent aap samjho sir yaha pe koi bhi person jo hai wo manually nahi bhej raha hai sir ek system laga hua hai jaise hi lead generate hoti hai wo automatically aapke paas suggestions me chali jati hai sir koi bhi aap aap ye socho ki koi bhi intentionally kuch kaam kar hi nahi raha hai sir wo automatic sab cheez setting hai sir kyuki 1.5 lakh by lead per day generate hoti hai to koi manually kitni lead ko kaise kaise karega sir circulate nahi kar sakta hai na sir to uske liye system bana hua hai.
Customer: Jab ye sab cheeze hoti hai tabhi aap log dete hai uske baad fir waise hi chod dete hai.
Executive: Sir sir aisa nahi hai aap to itne purane client hai sir mai wahi to keh raha hu sir aisa nahi hai ki koi intentionally ha hume aap se kya dikkat hai ye mujhe must bataiye sir. Koi aap se koi dushmani thodi na hai IndiaMART ki. Jisko bhi aap denge fir jisko subscription lena hoga usko karenge.
Executive: Na na na sir aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai sir aisa nahi hai aisi koi baat nahi hai sir aap.
Executive: Sir 2022 se aapka registration hai sir IndiaMART pe. Thik hai? Aur dusri cheez aisa nahi hai ki bhai khali maximizer ki bhai maximizer package hai isliye hai waha pe aapki product industry me aapko bhi pata hai ki star wale bhi hai leader wale bhi hai waha pe hamara jo monthly ka jo by lead ka jo.
Customer: Maximizer le liya to ab usse aao wo le liya.
Executive: Na na na sir mai to aapko koi suggestion nahi kar raha mai ye keh raha hu ki aapke product me mai aapko batau aapke product me hamare 12 mahine me 1,21,563 by lead approved hui hai 1,21,563 aur aapka consumption mai aapko batau na 780 hai. Ab 1,21,563 me se 780 ka kitna kitna percentage aapke paas ja raha hai sir. Thik hai to aisa nahi hai ki bhai lead ki kami nahi hai is saal mai aapko do teen request sun lo mujhe genuine by leads bhejo aap bhejo bhejna mat.
Executive: Sir mai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states inquiries decrease after subscription.

- Small plan was also not useful.

- States irrelevant inquiries are received.



Resolution:

- Executive explains lead generation process.

- Executive shares lead consumption data.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead generation, category
